catalogue_raissonne: Hind 95 os; B.62; Mz.193 os; Holl. 62 os; B-B.32-3
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
text: Rembrandt had a great gift for conveying intimacy with just a few etched lines. Here he places the Holy Family in a setting of comfortable domesticityâ€”so comfortable, in fact, that Mary has kicked off her shoe while nursing. In this fashion, Rembrandt humanizes the sacred to make it more accessible.
title: The Holy Family
